title: Update available
text:
I have released a new update for the app.

To use all features, please install this update.
toggle: Do not show this update again
update-close: You can close the window, the update will be downloaded in the background.
download-success: The update has been downloaded and can now be installed.
download-success2: For this, the app needs to be restarted.
download-error: The update could not be installed!
no-update: The app is up to date
